title: Myriad of Sanguine Dreams
description: The "Myriad of Sanguine Dreams" is a collection of poetry capturing the feelings, emotions, social issues and stigmas in the society. The name itself means a multitude of buoyant dreams. The book is filled with topics both motivating and melancholic that falls under the umbrella of emotions and ultimately forms the essence of the book. It hopes to take the readers on a fun filled voyage of words and the world alike.
author: Shubhika Pande
